Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch 2.0 - ALAS2LIVEPATCH-2022-094: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-4.14.290-217.505
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2022-2588:
	A use-after-free flaw was found in route4_change in the net/sched/cls_route.c filter implementation in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a local user to crash the system and possibly lead to a local privilege escalation problem.
